howItWorks.title: How We Work
howItWorks.subtitle: Our six-step lifecycle ensures every automation we build is measurable, scalable, and continuously improving.

1.title: Discover
1.description: Understand business goals, workflows, and automation opportunities.

2.title: Analyze
2.description: Evaluate data and systems to identify inefficiencies and optimization opportunities.

3.title: Design
3.description: Create tailored AI and automation architecture aligned with business strategy.

4.title: Develop
4.description: Build and integrate scalable AI workflows and systems.

5.title: Deploy
5.description: Configure, test, and launch automation on reliable hosting infrastructure.

6.title: Optimize
6.description: Continuously monitor, retrain models, and improve system performance.
